sense.gloss: child over 1 but not yet of school age
infants, babies and very young children
childhood friend, friend from infancy, old playmate
baby talk (e.g. "choo-choo" for train), words and speech patterns used by infants
child's mind, child's heart, young mind
very young bride, child bride, childish wife

r_ele.r: ようじとつぜんししょうこうぐん

sense.gloss: Massacre of the Innocents (infanticide by Herod that appears in the New Testament)
young and sweet, adorable, cute, tender, innocent

r_ele.r: ようちさんぎょうほごろん

sense.gloss: infant-industry argument, theory of infant-industry protection
when one was a very young child, very early in one's life
